018package org.opengis.referencing.operation;
019
020
021/**
022 * Base interface for conical map projections.
023 *
024 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (IRD)
025 * @version 3.1
026 * @since   1.0
027 *
028 * @see org.opengis.referencing.crs.ProjectedCRS
029 *
030 * @deprecated
031 *   This interface is not part of the OGC/ISO abstract specifications. This interface has been added in GeoAPI
032 *   as a way to know the kind of map projection, but it is only one classification scheme among many.
033 *   This way of classifying projections is difficult to implement and rarely used.
034 */
035@Deprecated(since = "3.1")
036public interface ConicProjection extends Projection {
037}
